#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
char* r(char *s, char *ss) {
    char *i;
    i = strstr(s, ss);

    int l = strlen(ss);
    while (i != NULL) {
        i[0] = '\0';
        i = i+l;
        strcat(s, i);
        i = strstr(s, ss);
        }
    return s;
    }
int main() {
    int n;
    char s[10000];
    scanf("%d", &n);
    char ss[n][10000];
    cin >> s;
    char *temp;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        cin >> ss[i];
        }
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        temp = r(s, ss[i]);
        strcpy(s, temp);
        if (strlen(s) == 0) break;
        }
    if (strlen(s) == 0) printf("0\n");
    else cout << s;
    }
